titleStmt.title: The dignity and duty of a married state in a sermon preach'd at the celebration of a marriage in the English Episcopal Church at Amsterdam / by John Cockburn.
titleStmt.author: Cockburn, John, 1652-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by H. Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: Imprint date suggested by Wing ; a 1708 imprint date is suggested in NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
